entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 6.
